exploreUrl:
<js>
const data = [
    "玄幻魔法",
    "修真武侠",
    "言情小说",
    "历史军事",
    "游戏竞技",
    "科幻空间",
    "悬疑惊悚",
    "同人小说",
    "都市小说",
    "官场职场",
    "穿越时空",
    "青春校园"
];

let categorys = [];
const status = ["连载", "全本"];

for (let i of status) {
    categorys.push({
        title: i,
        url: `/ranking?status=${i}&page={{page}}`,
        style: {
            layout_flexGrow: 1,
            layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
        }
    });
    
    for (let j of data) {
        categorys.push({
            title: j,
            url: `/ranking?category=${j}&status=${i}&page={{page}}`,
            style: {
                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25
            }
        });
    }
}

categorys.push({
    title: "最新",
    url: "/ranking?new=1&page={{page}}",
    style: {
        layout_flexGrow: 1,
        layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
    }
});

for (let j of data) {
    categorys.push({
        title: j,
        url: `/ranking?category=${j}&new=1&page={{page}}`,
        style: {
            layout_flexGrow: 1,
            layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25
        }
    });
}

categorys.push({
    title: "字数",
    url: "/ranking?wordNumber=1&page={{page}}",
    style: {
        layout_flexGrow: 1,
        layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
    }
});

for (let j of data) {
    categorys.push({
        title: j,
        url: `/ranking?category=${j}&wordNumber=1&page={{page}}`,
        style: {
            layout_flexGrow: 1,
            layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25
        }
    });
}

JSON.stringify(categorys);
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    var open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument, '', String(source.bookSourceComment)) || {};
    open_argument[key] = value;
    var result = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(result);
    return result;
}

function getFanqieCookie() {
    try {
        return String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || '');
    } catch (e) {
        return '';
    }
}

var open_argument = source.getVariable();
var base_url = getArguments(open_argument, 'server', String(source.bookSourceComment)) || '';
var ms = getArguments(open_argument, 'tone_id', String(source.bookSourceComment)) || '';
var source_type = getArguments(open_argument, 'source_type', String(source.bookSourceComment)) || '男频';
var tab = getArguments(open_argument, 'media', String(source.bookSourceComment)) || '小说';
var sources = getArguments(open_argument, 'source', String(source.bookSourceComment)) || '番茄';


var sdtoken;
try {
    var loginInfoMap = source.getLoginInfoMap ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {};
    sdtoken = String(loginInfoMap['手动填写番茄token(可不填)'] || '');
} catch (e) {
    sdtoken = '';
}

var rawCookie = getFanqieCookie() || sdtoken;
var match = rawCookie.match(/sessionid=[^;]+/);
var fqcookie = match ? encodeURIComponent(match[0]) : '';
if (!fqcookie) {
    java.toast('您还未登陆番茄账号，无法同步数据哦！');
    }
var fqsjurl = base_url + "/bookshelf?page={{page}}&cookie=" + fqcookie;

var groupDatas = [];
var infoData = [];

function deviceType() {
    try {
        return !!java.androidId();
    } catch (e) {
        return false;
    }
}

var device = deviceType() ? 'android' : 'ios';
var hasValidCookie = fqcookie.length > 0;

if (device === 'android' && hasValidCookie) {
    function groupQuery() {
        try {
            var url = base_url + "/group_name?cookie=" + fqcookie;
            var res = java.ajax(url);
            var response = JSON.parse(res);
            
            if (!(response && response.data)) {
                  }

            response.data.forEach(function(group) {
                var keys = Object.keys(group);
                if (keys.length > 0) {
                    var key = keys[0];
                    var value = group[key];
                    if (value && value.length) {
                        groupDatas.push({
                            title: key,
                            url: base_url + "/bookshelf2?page={{page}}&book_ids=" + value.join(","),
                            style: {
                                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                            }
                        });
                    }
                }
            });

            if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    title: "--",
                    url: "",
                    style: {
                        layout_flexGrow: 1,
                        layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        } catch (e) {
            java.longToast("分组获取失败: " + e.message);
                    }
    }

    try {
        java.longToast("正在加载分组数据...");
        var sessionid = match ? match[0] : '';
        var userUrl = base_url + "/fquser?" + sessionid;
        var userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
        var userData = JSON.parse(userRes);
        
        var userName = (userData && userData.data && userData.data.name) ? userData.data.name : '未知用户';
        infoData = [{
            title: userName + "个人中心",
            url: "",
            style: {
                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
            }
        }];
        
        groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
        java.longToast("操作失败: " + e.message);
            }
}

var style_list = [];
try {
    var durl =  `${base_url}/discover_style?source=${sources}&source_type=${source_type}&tab=${tab}`;
    var res = java.ajax(durl);
    var result = JSON.parse(res);
    style_list = result.style_list || [];
    java.toast(result.msg);
} catch (e) {
    java.toast("发现样式获取失败");
}

var finalData = infoData.concat(groupDatas, style_list);
JSON.stringify(finalData);
</js>

if (`${tags}`) {info = info +  `🕹分类：${tags}\n`};
if (`${role}`) {info = info +  `🎗书籍主角：${role}\n`};

${abstract}\n`};
if (`${book_review}`) {info = info +  `‎\n${book_review}\n`};

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);  
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);  
    }  
  }  
  return paramStr;  
};

	media = "小说"

	} else {
	media = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'media',String(source.bookSourceComment));
	}
if (key.includes('@')) {
  const parts = key.split('@');
  key = parts[0];
  sources = parts[1] || sources;
}
	`${base_url}/search?title=${key}&tab=${media}&source=${sources}&key=${key2}`
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  let defaultVariable = {
    "volume": {
      "status": false,
      "mode": 1,
      "spacer": " | ",
      "emptyVolumeName": {
        "action": false,
        "replace": "第一卷：默认"
      },
      "onlyOneShow": false
    }
  }
  let variable = (book.getVariable("custom") != "" && book.getVariable("custom") != null) ? book.getVariable("custom") : source.getVariable();
  if(variable != "" && variable != null){
    try{
      variable = JSON.parse(variable);
    } catch(err) {
      java.log(err);
      variable = defaultVariable;
    }
  } else {
    variable = defaultVariable;
  }
  let data = JSON.parse(result).data;
  let list = data.chapterListWithVolume;
  let volume = data.volumeNameList;
  let chapters = [];
  let volume_names = [];
  for(let i in list){
    for(let x in list[i]){
      let c = list[i][x];
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 1 && volume_names.indexOf(c.volume_name) == -1){
        volume_names.push(c.volume_name);
        if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          chapters.push({
            title: ((c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace) ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name),
            isVolume: true
          });
        }
      }
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 2){
        if(c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace){
          c.title = (c.volume_name == "" ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name) + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        } else if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          c.title = c.volume_name + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        }
      }
      c.url  = source.bookSourceUrl +  `/content?item_id=${c.itemId}`;
      chapters.push(c);
    }
  }
  chapters
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
            
var document = JsDom.parse(src);
            
// 获取包含<li>元素的<div>元素
var divs = document.select('ul.list > div');

// 将divs转换为数组以便排序
var divArray = [];
for (var i = 0; i < divs.size(); i++) {
    divArray.push(divs.get(i));
}

// 按照data-id属性对divArray进行排序
divArray.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.attr('data-id'), 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.attr('data-id'), 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});

var list = [];
// 遍历排序后的divArray
for (var i = 0; i < divArray.length; i++) {
    var div = divArray[i];
    var dataId = div.attr('data-id');
    // 获取当前div下的所有<li>元素
    var lis = div.select('li');
    for (var j = 0; j < lis.size(); j++) {
        var li = lis.get(j);
        var a = li.select('a').first();
        if (a != null) {
            list.push({
                text: a.text(),
                id: dataId, // 使用data-id属性
                url: a.attr('href')
            });
        }
    }
}

//java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

bookSourceComment:
250101新增番茄来源
250203新增七猫来源
250204新增得间来源
250204新增QQ来源(仅支持免费小说)
250204新增熊猫看书
250210更新日志：
1.采用全新验证方式，之后未填写密钥，可以在阅读页登陆后刷新阅读页面即可！
2.搜索默认改为全局搜索，目前仅支持番茄，七猫，QQ，得间，熊猫，后面的按钮是预设，后期会添加相关来源
3.新增大灰狼书架功能，在登陆里面点击书架查看

下个版本预计更新内容：
1.预计发现页新增阅读记录和大灰狼书架栏目
2.预计新增阅读记录，阅读过的书籍可在大灰狼书架-阅读历史中查看
3.预计新增塔读小说，米读小说，小米阅读，猫眼看书，部分起点

ruleSearch.lastChapter:
<js>
function fq_last() {
	let url = `https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id={{$.book_id}}`;
        let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data[0]; 
        return last["last_chapter_title"]+" · "+java.timeFormat(last["last_chapter_update_time"]*1000);
	
	}

	
function qm_last() {
	let headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
	sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'

params={'id':{{$.book_id}}, 'imei_ip':'2937357107','teeny_mode':0}

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);  
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);  
    }  
  }  
  return paramStr;  
};
paramSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key));
headerSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))
params['sign']=paramSign;
headers['sign']=headerSign;
let url = "https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/book/detail?"+urlEncode(params);
option = {'headers':headers};
let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url+','+JSON.stringify(option)))["data"]["book"];
let last2 =  `${last["latest_chapter_title"]} · ${java.timeFormat(last['update_time']*1000)} `
	return last2
	}
	//如果要显示最新章节，请去除注释，去除会影响搜索速度
//if ('{{$.source}}'=='番茄'){
//	'番茄:'+fq_last();
//	} else if ('{{$.source}}'=='七猫'){
//	'七猫:'+qm_last();
//	} else {
	'{{$.source}} {{$.last_chapter_title}}'
//		}

</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
let replaceCover = (u) => {
// java.log(u)
if (u.startsWith("https://")) u = u.substring(8)
else u = u.substring(7)
let uArr = u.split("/")
uArr[0] = "https://p6-novel.byteimg.com/origin"
let uArr2 = []
uArr.forEach((x) => {
    if (!x.includes("?") && !x.includes("~")) uArr2.push(x)
    else uArr2.push(x.split("~")[0])
	})
u = uArr2.join("/")
return u
	}
  let list = [];
  let resultData = JSON.parse(result).data;
   //java.toast(resultData)
  let data;
  if (resultData != null && resultData.book_shelf_info) {
    data = resultData.book_shelf_info;
    if (data != null) {
    let requestData = { books: [] };
    for (let i in data) {
      requestData["books"].push({
        book_id: data[i]["book_id"],
        item_id: "0",
      });
    }
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(resultData.book_shelf_info))
    let booksData = java.ajax(
      'https://fanqienovel.com/api/bookshelf/multidetail,{method: "post",body: ' +
        JSON.stringify(requestData) +
        "}"
    );
    // java.log(booksData)
    let books =  JSON.parse(booksData).data.detail_list;
    for (let i in books) {
      let d = books[i];
      list.push({
        src: d,
        book_name: d.book_name,
        thumb_url: replaceCover(d.thumb_url),
        abstract: d.abstract,
        word_number: d.word_number,
        book_id: d.book_id,
      });
    }
    }
  } else if (JSON.parse(result).book_list != null) {
    data = JSON.parse(result).book_list;
    for(let i in data){
      let d = data[i];
      list.push({
        src: d,
        author: d.author,
        book_name: d.book_name,
        thumb_url: replaceCover(d.thumb_url),
        book_id: d.book_id,
      });
    }
  } else if (resultData != null && resultData.list) {
    data = resultData.list;
    for(let i in data){
      let d = data[i];
      list.push({
        src: d,
        author: d.author,
        book_name: d.bookName,
        thumb_url: replaceCover(d.thumbUri),
        abstract: d.abstract,
        category: d.category,
        book_id: d.bookId,
      });
    }
  } else if (resultData != null  && (resultData.data || resultData.result)) {
    if(resultData.result){
        data = resultData.result;
    } else{
        data = resultData.data;
    }
    for(let i in data){
      let d = data[i];
      //let book = JSON.parse(java.ajax("https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id="+d.book_id)).data
      //lastChapterTitle = book.book_info.last_chapter_title + "·"  + java.timeFormat(d.last_publish_time * 1000)
      list.push({
        src: d,
        author: d.author,
        book_name: d.book_name,
        thumb_url: replaceCover(d.thumb_url),
        abstract: d.abstract,
        word_number: d.word_number,
        gender: d.gender,
        category: d.category,
        score: d.score,
        last_publish_time: d.last_chapter_update_time,
        book_id: d.book_id,
      });
    }
  } else list = JSON.parse(result)[0].content
  JSON.stringify(list)
</js>$[*]

let replaceCover = (u) => {
    if (u.startsWith("https://")) u = u.substring(8)

    let uArr = u.split("/")
    uArr[0] = "https://p6-novel.byteimg.com/origin"
    let uArr2 = []
    uArr.forEach((x) => {

    u = uArr2.join("/")

}

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function getBookIdFull(url) {
	const {java} = this
	$ = JSON.parse(url).data
	if ($.book_shelf_info != 0 && $.book_shelf_info != undefined) {
		arr = $.book_shelf_info.map($ => $.book_id)
	} else if (list = $.data_list != 0 && $.data_list != undefined)  {
		arr = $.data_list.map($ => $.book_id_str)
	} else {
		java.toast("获取 book_id 失败，你可能需要登录！")
	}
	return arr
}
let ck = "sessionid=" + (String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) ? String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) : (source.getLoginInfoMap() ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {})['手动登录Token'])

getShelf = () => {
let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'
let book_shelf_info = java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
  headers: {
    'Cookie': ck
  }
}))

let arrB = []
for (let i of JSON.parse(book_shelf_info).data.book_shelf_info) {
  arrB.push(i.book_id)
}
write_config('bookshelf.' + read_config('userinfo.userid'), arrB)

bid = getBookIdFull(book_shelf_info)
let id_list = splitArray(bid, 100)
let urls = []
id_list.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(source.key + "/multi-detail?bookid=" + i.join(","))
})

res = java.ajaxAll(urls)
let resp = {book_info: []}
res.forEach(r => {
  resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
})

return resp
}

function getByGroupName(name) {
  let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'

  let book_shelf_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'Cookie': ck,
    }
  })))
  let group_bookids = {
    "组外": []
  }
  book_shelf_info.data.book_shelf_info.forEach(i => {
    if (!group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "组外"]) group_bookids[i.group_name] = []
    group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "组外"].push(i.book_id)
  })
  // java.log(JSON.stringify(group_bookids["组外"]))
  // java.log(decodeURIComponent(name))
  if (!group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)]) return {data: []}
  //java.log("awa")
  let book_ids = splitArray(group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)], 100)
  let urls = []

  book_ids.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(source.key + "/multi-detail?bookid=" + i.join(","))
  })
  
  res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

  let resp = {book_info: []}
  res.forEach(r => {
    resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
  })

  return resp
}

function getByTabIndex(index) {
  let url = _mlsec.requestHeader(
	  "bookmall/tab",
    "version_name=5.8.9.32",
	  null,
	  ck
  )
  let all = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url))
  let tab = all.data.tab_item[0].cell_data[index].cell_data
  if (!tab) tab = []
  let bookList = []
  for (let i of tab) {
    bookList = bookList.concat(i.book_data)
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(i.book_data))
  }
  return { book_info: bookList }
}

if (baseUrl.endsWith("bookshelf")) result = getShelf("bookshelf/info")
else {
  let w = baseUrl.split("/")
  if (baseUrl.includes("groupName")) {
    result = getByGroupName(w[w.length - 1])
  } else if (baseUrl.includes("tab")) {
    result = getByTabIndex(parseInt(w[w.length - 1]))
  } else result = JSON.parse(result)
}
JSON.stringify({data: result.book_list || result.book_info || result.data.result || result.data.book_info || result.detail_list || result.data })
</js>

function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>

                resultData.publication_list || resultData.result || resultData;

    let bookIds = targetData.book_shelf_info.map(item => `{"book_id": "${item.book_id}"}`).join(',');

`https://fanqienovel.com/api/bookshelf/multidetail,{"method": "post","body": {"books":[${bookIds}]}}`

            tags:d.tags,
            word_number:d.word_number,
            lastChapterTitle: d.last_chapter_title,
            abstract: d.abstract,
            book_id: d.book_id,
        });
    }
} else {
    list = targetData.content || targetData;
}

JSON.stringify({data: list})

<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*

ruleBookInfo.author: ##作者：</aria>([^<]+)<aria##$1###
ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
'　　🔖最近更新：'
+result.match(/最新章节 ([^\n]+)/)[1]
+'\n　　🔖更新时间：'
+result.match(/更新时间 ([^\n]+)/)[1]
+'\n‎\n'
+result.match(/textarea hidden>([\W\w]+?)<\/texta/)[1].replace(/</g,'<').replace(/>/g,'>').replace(/'/g,"'")
</js>
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
@@##span>连载至([^<]+)##$1###
<js>result.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: ##"book-title">([^<]+)</h2##$1###

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  flag=source.getVariable()=="1"?true:false
  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.data.vs.forEach((booklet) => {
    array.push({ 
    	    text:"📖["+String(booklet.vN).replace(/.共\d+章.*|.订阅本卷/g,'')+"]📖",
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.cs.forEach((chapter) => {
    	  vip = chapter.sS!="1"?"✿·":""
    	  href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/`+baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]+`/`+chapter.id+`/`;
    	  href=flag?href+",{'webView': true}":href
      array.push({
        text: String(vip+chapter.cN).replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]?/g,''),
        href: href,
        time:String(chapter.uT)+"｜"+String(chapter.cnt)+"字",
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'77800','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

result?result:'无法获取内容？
1.编辑书源添加自己的账号信息，找到目录列表规则，按提示添加账号信息
2.如果添加了账号信息仍然无法获取内容，请尝试刷新或更新账号信息（方式二）
3.必要说明：如果使用方式一添加了账号信息，每次打开新的书籍详情页或刷新正文都会重新获取账号信息，因此之前获取的书籍正文的链接将会失效，因此建议全文下载或者按2操作
必要说明：在使用本源前，请考虑到使用本源可能造成的账号封禁等问题'

searchUrl:
<js>
//md5加密开始
var rotateLeft = function(lValue, iShiftBits) {
    return (lValue << iShiftBits) | (lValue >>> (32 - iShiftBits))
}
var addUnsigned = function(lX, lY) {
    var lX4, lY4, lX8, lY8, lResult;
    lX8 = (lX & 0x80000000);
    lY8 = (lY & 0x80000000);
    lX4 = (lX & 0x40000000);
    lY4 = (lY & 0x40000000);
    lResult = (lX & 0x3FFFFFFF) + (lY & 0x3FFFFFFF);
    if (lX4 & lY4) return (lResult ^ 0x80000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
    if (lX4 | lY4) {
        if (lResult & 0x40000000) return (lResult ^ 0xC0000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
        else return (lResult ^ 0x40000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    } else {
        return (lResult ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    }
}
var F = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & y) | ((~x) & z)
}
var G = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & z) | (y & (~z))
}
var H = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x ^ y ^ z)
}
var I = function(x, y, z) {
    return (y ^ (x | (~z)))
}
var FF = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(F(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var GG = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(G(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var HH = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(H(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var II = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(I(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var convertToWordArray = function(string) {
    var lWordCount;
    var lMessageLength = string.length;
    var lNumberOfWordsTempOne = lMessageLength + 8;
    var lNumberOfWordsTempTwo = (lNumberOfWordsTempOne - (lNumberOfWordsTempOne % 64)) / 64;
    var lNumberOfWords = (lNumberOfWordsTempTwo + 1) * 16;
    var lWordArray = Array(lNumberOfWords - 1);
    var lBytePosition = 0;
    var lByteCount = 0;
    while (lByteCount < lMessageLength) {
        lWordCount = (lByteCount - (lByteCount % 4)) / 4;
        lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4) * 8;
        lWordArray[lWordCount] = (lWordArray[lWordCount] | (string.charCodeAt(lByteCount) << lBytePosition));
        lByteCount++
    }
    lWordCount = (lByteCount - (lByteCount % 4)) / 4;
    lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4) * 8;
    lWordArray[lWordCount] = lWordArray[lWordCount] | (0x80 << lBytePosition);
    lWordArray[lNumberOfWords - 2] = lMessageLength << 3;
    lWordArray[lNumberOfWords - 1] = lMessageLength >>> 29;
    return lWordArray
};
var wordToHex = function(lValue) {
    var WordToHexValue = "",
    WordToHexValueTemp = "",
    lByte, lCount;
    for (lCount = 0; lCount <= 3; lCount++) {
        lByte = (lValue >>> (lCount * 8)) & 255;
        WordToHexValueTemp = "0" + lByte.toString(16);
        WordToHexValue = WordToHexValue + WordToHexValueTemp.substr(WordToHexValueTemp.length - 2, 2)
    }
    return WordToHexValue
};
var uTF8Encode = function(string) {
    string = string.replace(/\x0d\x0a/g, "\x0a");
    var output = "";
    for (var n = 0; n < string.length; n++) {
        var c = string.charCodeAt(n);
        if (c < 128) {
            output += String.fromCharCode(c)
        } else if ((c > 127) && (c < 2048)) {
            output += String.fromCharCode((c >> 6) | 192);
            output += String.fromCharCode((c & 63) | 128)
        } else {
            output += String.fromCharCode((c >> 12) | 224);
            output += String.fromCharCode(((c >> 6) & 63) | 128);
            output += String.fromCharCode((c & 63) | 128)
        }
    }
    return output;
};
function md5(string) {
    var x = Array();
    var k, AA, BB, CC, DD, a, b, c, d;
    var S11 = 7,
    S12 = 12,
    S13 = 17,
    S14 = 22;
    var S21 = 5,
    S22 = 9,
    S23 = 14,
    S24 = 20;
    var S31 = 4,
    S32 = 11,
    S33 = 16,
    S34 = 23;
    var S41 = 6,
    S42 = 10,
    S43 = 15,

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleContent.replaceRegex:
<js>
z = "的一是了我不人在他有这个上们来到时大地为子中你说生国年着就那和要她出也得里后自以会家可下而过天去能对小多然于心学么之都好看起发当没成只如事把还用第样道想作种开美乳阴液茎欲呻肉交性胸私穴淫臀舔射脱裸骚唇";
txt = escape(result).replace(
	new RegExp('%ue8([0-9a-fA-F]{2})','gi'),
	($0,$1)=>z[+('0x'+$1)]
);

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

 url[i]=url0+i+url1;
}
url

https://m.hjbook.com/search.php?keyword={{key}}&submit=
@js:
u="https://m.hjbook.com/search.php?keyword=submit="
loc=java.get(u,{})
lo=String(loc.headers("location"||"Location")).replace(/\[(.*)\]/,"$1")
code=loc.statusCode()
if(code>=301){
uu=source.key+lo
java.log(uu)
re=java.ajax(uu)
java.log(uu)
na=re.match(/" name="(.*)" v/)[1]
va=re.match(/value="(.*)"\/\>/)[1]
no=re.match(/bute\("value","(.*)"\),d/)[1]
bd=`${na}=${va}&nonce=${no}`
java.log(bd)
url=source.key+"/search.php?keyword={{key}}&submit=,"+JSON.stringify({
  "body": bd,
  "method": "POST",
    	})}else{url=source.key+"/search.php?keyword={{key}}&submit="}

bookSourceComment:
11/13更新：
1.发现更换域名为列表带图的m站；
2.部分长评需要进入详情页面获取，正文修复显示完整评论；
1.点击按时间排序或点赞排序可切换书评加载顺序，更换后请刷新目录和正文;
2.可对发现结果进行筛选，点击查看当前显示筛选状态;
3.发现列表提示TypeError:Cannot read property"1" from null就是该筛选状态下没有书籍。

bookSourceComment:
// Error: org.mozilla.javascript.EcmaError: ReferenceError: "sourceUrl" is not defined. (<Unknown source>#5) in <Unknown source> at line number 5

此书源可以开箱即用，无需进行其他操作
但由于此书源API来自于番茄Web共享API服务项目，所有API均来自于共享地址池，而共享地址池的地址来自于各个搭建番茄Web（frpc版）的用户
因此，如果你有能力搭建番茄web服务，请尽量一起共建此服务（如果所有人都选择白嫖而不去搭建，那么所有人都将无法使用此API/书源）

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  let defaultVariable = {
    "volume": {
      "status": false,
      "mode": 1,
      "spacer": " | ",
      "emptyVolumeName": {
        "action": false,
        "replace": "第一卷：默认"
      },
      "onlyOneShow": false
    }
  }
  let variable = (book.getVariable("custom") != "" && book.getVariable("custom") != null) ? book.getVariable("custom") : source.getVariable();
  if(variable != "" && variable != null){
    try{
      variable = JSON.parse(variable);
    } catch(err) {
      java.log(err);
      variable = defaultVariable;
    }
  } else {
    variable = defaultVariable;
  }
  let data = JSON.parse(result).data;
  let list = data.chapterListWithVolume;
  let volume = data.volumeNameList;
  let chapters = [];
  let volume_names = [];
  for(let i in list){
    for(let x in list[i]){
      let c = list[i][x];
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 1 && volume_names.indexOf(c.volume_name) == -1){
        volume_names.push(c.volume_name);
        if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          chapters.push({
            title: ((c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace) ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name),
            isVolume: true
          });
        }
      }
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 2){
        if(c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace){
          c.title = (c.volume_name == "" ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name) + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        } else if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          c.title = c.volume_name + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        }
      }
      c.url  = `http://list.api-fanqienovel.sunianyun.live/random#/content?item_id=${c.itemId}`;
      c.updateTime = '更新时间: ' + java.timeFormat(c.firstPassTime*1000);
      chapters.push(c);
    }
  }
  chapters
</js>
ruleToc.chapterName: title<js>##正文卷.|正文.|VIP章节.|免费章节.|VIP卷.|默认卷.|章节目录.|最新章节.|[\(（【].*?[求更谢乐发订/万架字票合补加].*?[】）\)]</js>

bookSourceComment:
114xs.cc
25-04-05 靈狐 制
部分书详情页封面无法访问可使用搜索封面规则

此书源可以导入即可使用，无需进行其他操作
但由于此书源API来自于番茄Web共享API服务项目，所有API均来自于共享地址池，而共享地址池的地址来自于各个搭建番茄Web（frpc版）的用户
因此，如果你有能力搭建番茄web服务，请尽量一起共建此服务（如果所有人都选择白嫖而不去搭建，那么所有人都将无法使用此API/书源）
搭建方法加群了解（选择内网穿透frpc版本）
此书源使用Xposed模块番茄Web 搭建
本书源使用frpc版本开启内网穿透后制作，欢迎大家下载frp版本开启穿透挂后台为本书源提供节点
